triples.name: Multi-agent pathfinding
triples.relevance: ICBS addresses the multi-agent pathfinding problem of computing collision-free paths for groups of agents.

triples.name: Search algorithm
triples.relevance: CBS and ICBS are specialized search algorithms that improve upon existing search methodologies for pathfinding.

triples.name: Improved Conflict-Based Search
triples.relevance: ICBS is the novel algorithm introduced in this paper with three orthogonal improvements over the original Conflict-Based Search.
